essential.msg: The Essential mod is completely incompatible with this pack. Use the E4MC mod instead to play with your friends.

essential-container.msg: The Essential mod is completely incompatible with this pack. Use the E4MC mod instead to play with your friends.

optifine.msg: If you are seeing this, you have manually added the Optifine mod to the modpack. The Optifine mod is completely unnecessary. This pack uses Sodium.
